markdownRemark.html:
The devs have revolted!

For years they kept us locked away in the windowless room behind the server racks. We lived there in obscurity, optimizing protobufs and DHT routing tables. But we broke loose, and then vamoose, and now you know the plot.

Anyway, welcome to the official LBRY tech channel. I'm Grin, the CTO. I'll be writing about the technical nitty-gritty of LBRY and keeping you appaised of what's coming up for the protocol. This channel is aimed at software developers, computer scientists, and other technical folk. If that's what you're into, follow us üèÉ

To help entertain and inform you, tell me what you want to see here. Post what you're curious about in the comments. First post is coming next week.

Cheers üòÉ
